sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Customer Details">5fb70c1d0747301029a8f0269c1ed032</macroponent><name>Check for sysId from nav bar</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const sysid = api.context.props.sysid;

    console.log("CHECK FOR SYSID FROM NAV BAR");

    if (sysid == '-99') {
        api.setState('uidQuery', `user=${api.context.session.user.sys_id}`);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-14 00:13:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>e781997f0707301029a8f0269c1ed0f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check for sysId from nav bar</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Big Oil 2" source="x_683715_big_oil_2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Big Oil 2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e781997f0707301029a8f0269c1ed0f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-14 19:59:23</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
